translations: n.定居点，殖民地（settlement 复数）

sentences.sentence: At its peak around AD 600, this city was one of the largest human settlements in the world.
sentences.translation: 在公元600年左右的鼎盛时期，这座城市是世界上规模最大的人类定居点之一。

sentences.sentence: Israel's army entered the West Bank area on Tuesday to evacuate the last two Jewish settlements there.
sentences.translation: 周二，以色列军队进入约旦河西岸地区，撤离在那里的最后两个犹太定居点。

sentences.sentence: Phosphorus is a very significant indicator that horses, large numbers of horses were being kept in the settlements.
sentences.translation: 磷是一个非常重要的指标，表明人们在定居点驯养了马，大量的马。
